title: S'WICH — Summer Campaign
summary: Iconic summer homage spots across Sydney with a bag motif.
description: A vibrant summer campaign celebrating S'WICH's iconic presence across Sydney. Shot at key locations with a distinctive bag motif running throughout the narrative.
impact: Featured in AdNews 'Campaigns of the Month'
15% increase in foot traffic to flagship stores

title: MapleMoon — Brand Identity
summary: Complete rebrand for artisan confectionery with whimsical packaging system.
description: A playful yet sophisticated identity system for MapleMoon's premium confectionery range. The design celebrates craft and whimsy while maintaining shelf presence.

title: Jac+Jack — AW24 Campaign
summary: Minimalist autumn/winter lookbook shot in raw industrial spaces.
description: A stripped-back campaign emphasizing texture and form through industrial architecture. Shot on location across Sydney's manufacturing precincts.

title: Betoota — Collaboration Suite
summary: Multi-brand content partnerships with Australia's satirical news leader.
description: Strategic content partnerships across multiple brands, blending Betoota's distinctive voice with client messaging in authentic, engaging formats.

title: Materre — Brand Launch
summary: Holistic brand and digital experience for wellness retreat.
description: A grounded, earth-connected identity for Materre's wellness sanctuary. The system emphasizes natural materials, space, and intentionality.
impact: Fully booked 6 months in advance within 8 weeks of launch

title: Cape Lands — Print Series
summary: Limited edition print series celebrating Australian coastal landscapes.
description: A photographic study of Australia's southern coastline, printed on archival stock. The series explores light, form, and the relationship between land and sea.

title: MyFlowerMan — Digital Refresh
summary: Streamlined ecommerce experience with focus on seasonal ranges.
description: A complete digital overhaul emphasizing seasonal availability and sustainable sourcing. Clean interface with rich photography showcasing product quality.

title: Mix Family Group — Venue System
summary: Unified identity system across hospitality portfolio.
description: A flexible identity architecture that unifies Mix Family Group's diverse venues while allowing individual personality. Applied across signage, menus, and communications.
impact: Brand recognition increased 65% in target demographics
